Bada Bean Bada Boom Snacks Review & Info (Dairy-Free & Vegan)
s: September 3, 2020 - I bet you’ve never thought about snacking on broad beans (aka fava beans). Well Bada Bean Bada Boom, a Better Body Foods brand, aims to change that. They roast non-GMO beans with a touch of sunflower oil, rice flour, sea salt, and spices for a high protein, high fiber, and low carbohydrate snack.
